BaseTaskTypeRegistry
public interface TaskTypeRegistry
extends org.gridlab.gridsphere.portlet.service.PortletService

Method Summary
 TaskSubmissionService getTaskSubmissionService(TaskType type)
          Returns the submission service that submits tasks of the given type.
 java.util.List getTaskSubmissionServices()
          Returns all the submission services that have registered with this manager.
 java.util.List getTaskTypes()
          Returns all the task types for all the registered submission services.

Method Detail

getTaskTypes

public java.util.List getTaskTypes()
Returns all the task types for all the registered submission services.

Returns:
The available task types
See Also:
TaskType

getTaskSubmissionServices

public java.util.List getTaskSubmissionServices()
Returns all the submission services that have registered with this manager.

Returns:
The available task submission services
See Also:
TaskSubmissionService

getTaskSubmissionService

public TaskSubmissionService getTaskSubmissionService(TaskType type)
Returns the submission service that submits tasks of the given type.

Parameters:
type - The task type
Returns:
The associated task submission service

registerTaskTypes

public void registerTaskTypes(TaskSubmissionService service)
Registers the given service with this manager. Once registered, the task submission manager can use the given service to submit all tasks supported by that service.

Parameters:
service - The task submission service

unregisterTaskTypes

public void unregisterTaskTypes(TaskSubmissionService service)
Unregisters the given service from this manager.

Parameters:
service - The task submission service
